title: Difference of Squares Definition
text: A difference of squares is an expression with the form $$n^2 x^2-b^2$$, where $$n$$ and $$b$$ are positive integers.
speech: A difference of squares is an expression with the form  n squared x squared, minus, b squared , where  n  and  b  are positive integers.
pacedSpeech: A difference of squares is an expression with the form   n squared x squared, minus, b squared

title: Integer Definition
text: Integers are positive and negative whole numbers. For example, $$4$$, $$20$$, and $$-36$$ are integers, while $$2.31$$ is not.
speech: Integers are positive and negative whole numbers. For example,  4 ,  20 , and  negative 36  are integers, while  2.31  is not.

title: Classifying the Expression
text: Is the expression a difference of squares?

title: Factoring a Difference of Squares
text: A difference of squares $$n^2 x^2-b^2$$ can be factored as $$\left(nx+b\right) \left(nx-b\right)$$.
speech: A difference of squares  n squared x squared, minus b squared  can be factored as  parentheses, n x plus b,  times, parentheses, n x minus b,  .
